name: MacBook Pro 16"
description: M2 Max chip with 32GB RAM. The powerhouse that handles everything from development to video editing without breaking a sweat.

name: Dell Ultrasharp 27" 4K Monitor
description: Super satisfied with the quality. 27", 4K resolution with excellent color accuracy. Perfect for long coding sessions.

name: Custom Mechanical Keyboard
description: Custom build with Cherry MX Brown switches. Tactile feedback that makes typing a pleasure. Hot-swappable keys for endless customization.

name: Logitech MX Master 3
description: Ergonomic mouse that fits perfectly in hand. Customizable buttons and smooth scrolling make navigation effortless during long work sessions.

name: Adjustable LED Desk Lamp
description: Smart LED lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature. Includes wireless charging pad for my phone. Can be used as a fill light during calls too.

name: Electric Standing Desk
description: Height-adjustable standing desk with memory presets. Switching between sitting and standing throughout the day keeps me energized and focused.
